price: ‘নিশ্চয় এইটোৱেই হৈছে সেই শাস্তি, যিটোক তোমালোকে সন্দেহ কৰিছিলা’।
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā mā kuntum bihi tamtarūna
